references: Related: Ord 265036. Amending: Ord 92190, Ord 97361, Ord 96281
summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to and regulating plumbing and plumbing systems; amending Sections 5.01.375, 5.01.390, 5.02.015, 5.02.030, 5.05.070, 5.05.080, 5.08.030, 5.08.090, 5.10.180, 5.10.250, and Tables No. 2-1 and No. 9-1 of the Plumbing Code (Ordinance 92190) and adding a new section thereto designated Section 5.06.150.
